artist: Maker: Red Grooms; Publisher: Brooke Alexander, New York
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
description: Caricature of former Minnesota Vikings quarterback Fran Tarkenton
image_copyright: Â©Red Grooms %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
medium: Painted vinyl, aluminum armature, and polyester stuffing
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limtied, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1983.
text: Red Grooms salutes legendary Minnesota Vikings quarterback Fran Tarkenton in this delightful life-size caricature that was partly inspired by witnessing the devotion of local sport fans for their hero athlete. The three-dimensional multiple is one of about 25 editioned works Grooms produced in collaboration with Vermillion Editions Limited of Minneapolis.
title: Fran Tarkenton
